tool_description: Applies post-processing algorithms to enhance image quality and prepare images for diagnostic review.

image_series_id.description: Unique identifier for the image series to process

processing_algorithms.description: List of processing algorithms to apply

error_messages: Invalid image series ID: The specified image series ID does not exist.
Unsupported processing algorithm: One or more specified algorithms are not supported.
Processing failed: Image processing encountered an error and could not complete.
Invalid enhancement level: Use one of [mild, moderate, aggressive].
Insufficient image quality: Source images are of insufficient quality for processing.
usage: Provide image_series_id and processing_algorithms. Optionally set enhancement_level for processing intensity.

processed_series_id.description: Unique identifier for the processed image series
